alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:18AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Oglala Lakota and southeastern Fall River Counties through 145 AM MDT... At 118 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Slim Butte, or 18 miles north of Chadron, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Slim Buttes Housing around 135 AM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
